name: La cumbancha
description:
La cumbancha Our entry for the Miz Jam 1.

You have to bring back the cargo to the starting point. Be careful of the bombs that are underwater and the enemies that are guarding the seas.

How to play
  • Use WASD or the arrow keys to maneuver the ship.
  • Use Z or Enter to select option in menus.
The team

🐼 Itzel "Noisy Panda" González Estrada 🎶 Audio 🎶.
